titles.title: To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for Related Agencies, Federal Mediation and Conciliation Service, Salaries and Expenses for fiscal year 2024.
To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for Related Agencies, Federal Mediation and Conciliation Service, Salaries and Expenses for fiscal year 2024.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: This bill limits FY2024 funding for the Federal Mediation and Conciliation Service's Salaries and Expenses account.
